preprocess

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • preprocess.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    The connection object stores connection data needed by the Preprocessor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(int id, java.lang.String name, ConnectionType connectionType, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sshUsername, java.lang.String keyFileName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> structureList)
      Create a new ConnectionData with location, user name, password SHH user name and SSH key and Structure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection(int id,
          java.lang.String name,
          ConnectionType connectionType,
          java.lang.String location,
          java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          java.lang.String sshUsername,
          java.lang.String keyFileName,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> structureList)
           throws InvalidStructureException
        Create a new ConnectionData with location, user name, password SHH user name and SSH key and Structure. This is used by the State class to allow deserialization of all connection objects.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the connection
        name - the name of the connection
        connectionType - the ConnectionType of the remote
        location - the location of the remote (typically a URL)
        username - username for login.
        password - Password for login.
        sshUsername - username for ssh-login
        keyFileName - name of the secret key file for ssh-login.
        Throws:
        InvalidStructureException - if the structure is inavlid and needed
